skills.name: Cannon
skills.description:
Charged Cannon.
1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: Alloy One Punch
skills.description: [SP: 12][CD: 9s] Smashes ground using mechanical arms, generating a shockwave that hits multiple times and knocks enemies back. Each hit deals 90% ATK of Physical DMG.
